SELECT e.earner_code ,e.earner_name ,e.is_native ,e.personal_no ,e.div_name ,e.div_code FROM earner e LEFT JOIN input_task it ON e.earner_code = it.earner_code AND e.worker_id = it.worker_id WHERE e.worker_id = #{worker_id} AND it.earner_code IS NULL AND it.payment_ym = #{payment_ym}
AND (e.earner_code ILIKE concat('%', #{search_value}, '%') OR e.earner_name ILIKE concat('%', #{search_value}, '%') OR e.div_code ILIKE concat('%', #{search_value}, '%'))

SELECT it.earner_code ,it.worker_id ,it.payment_ym ,e.earner_name ,e.div_code ,e.div_name ,e.is_native ,e.personal_no ,e.is_tuition ,e.is_artist ,e.is_sworker ,e.earner_type FROM input_task AS it LEFT JOIN earner AS e ON it.earner_code = e.earner_code AND it.worker_id = e.worker_id WHERE it.worker_id = #{worker_id} AND it.payment_ym = #{payment_ym}

SELECT count(*) as count ,worker_id ,SUM(total_payment) as total_payment ,SUM(tax_income) as tax_income ,SUM(tax_local) as tax_local ,SUM(tuition_amount) as tuition_amount ,SUM(ins_cost) as ins_cost ,SUM(sworker_ins) as sworker_ins ,SUM(workinjury_ins) as workinjury_ins ,SUM(real_payment) as real_payment FROM earner_tax WHERE worker_id = #{worker_id} AND payment_ym = #{payment_ym} GROUP BY worker_id

SELECT earner_code ,SUM(total_payment) as total_payment ,SUM(tax_income) as tax_income ,SUM(tax_local) as tax_local ,SUM(tuition_amount) as tuition_amount ,SUM(artist_cost) as artist_cost ,SUM(artist_cost) as sworker_cost ,SUM(ins_cost) as ins_cost ,SUM(sworker_ins) as sworker_ins ,SUM(workinjury_ins) as workinjury_ins ,SUM(real_payment) as real_payment FROM earner_tax WHERE worker_id = #{worker_id} AND payment_ym = #{payment_ym} AND earner_code = #{earner_code} GROUP BY earner_code
